attributes.additional_details:
All convicted rioters and troubled teens should be sent to a specialist Bootcamp.

Bootcamp is a very effective system in the US and other countries and would help install respect, discipline and common manners in those teenagers who lack it.

This would be way more effective than a teenage prison or detention centre.

Vote now to change a flawed system!

See - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zT2npRPVws&feature=related
